document_data.name: Haifami
document_data.mainbody: The '''Haifami''' were a tribe of [[human]]s who inhabited an area of [[Jazayir al-Sartan]] in [[southwest Zakhara]].
document_data.Organization: The Chief only assembled a "court" when major decisions needed to be made.
document_data.Activities: The humans of the Haifami were aggressive and war-like. They were also rumored to be cannibals. Either a female [[Elemental mage|sea mage]] or a special cleric called a [[kahin]] accompanied any expedition on the sea while fishing and searching for food. These spellcasters also accompanied military expeditions.
document_data.Base of Operations: Six small villages made up the Haifami tribe.
document_data.Members: Chief [[Shafiya]] ruled the Haifami. He was the third son of the previous chief and rose to power through his impressive martial skill.
